Manage Envoy lifecycle including fetching binaries and collection of process state.

Usage:
  getenvoy [command]

Available Commands:
  fetch       Downloads a version of Envoy. Available builds can be retrieved using `getenvoy list`.
  list        List available Envoy version references you can run
  run         Runs Envoy and collects process state on exit. Available builds can be retrieved using `getenvoy list`.

Flags:
  -h, --help              help for getenvoy
      --home-dir string   GetEnvoy home directory (location of downloaded artifacts, caches, etc)
  -v, --version           version for getenvoy

Use "getenvoy [command] --help" for more information about a command.
